old:
おぉ～～！！
わたしは幸せ者でーす！
column2:
Oh my goodness!
I'm such a fortunate person!

old:
ここで歌い、たたずむだけで、なんと！
聞くことができるのですから！
column2:
Just by singing and standing here, look!
You can hear it!

old:
幾人もの覚者さまの
素晴らしい冒険譚の数々をッ！
詩にすべき英雄的浪漫の数々をッ！！
column2:
The wonderful adventures of many arisen
! The heroic romance that should be turned into poems
!!

old:
あなたはご存知ですか？
伝承にある、白竜様と金色の竜の戦いを
column2: Do you know? The battle between the White Dragon and the Golden Dragon, as told in legends

old:
あぁ、白竜様の銀翼が空を舞うお姿！
どれほど神々しく、どれほど感動的な
ことでしょう――！
column2: Ah, the glorious sight of the White Dragon's silver wings dancing in the sky! How divine, how deeply moving it is!

old:
しかし、気になりませんか？
白竜様に敗れ墜ちた金色の竜は
その後どうなったのでしょうね
column2:
But aren't you curious?
I wonder what happened to the golden dragon that was defeated and crashed by Master White Dragon
after that?

old:
良き旅には良き仲間、良き試練
そして良き歌を！
column2:
A good journey, good friends, good trials
and good songs!

old: ではあなたの為に一曲――
column2: So let me sing a song for you—

old:
ららら～
何かご用でも～？
column2:
La la la la~
What can I do for you?

old:
おぉ～
なんという事でしょう～

あなたは今、他のミッションに参加予定ですね？
そちらを達成するか、予定を取り消してから
また来てくださ～い
column2:
You are now scheduled to participate in another mission?
Please come back to
after you have either accomplished that one or canceled your plans!
